abstract: Former professional football players Steve DeOssie and Jim Jeffcoat, who became friends as Dallas Cowboys teammates in 1980s, each have boy-girl set of twin children; their sons now play against each other in NFL--Zak DeOssie is long snapper for New York Giants and Jackson Jeffcoat is linebacker for Washington Redskins.
lead_paragraph: Three decades ago Steve DeOssie and Jim Jeffcoat became friends, as did their wives. Each couple had twins, one boy and one girl apiece. Now the two boys play for the N.F.L., while the girls are co-workers in Colorado.

headline.main: Two Sets of Twins Trace Lifetime Link to Two Teammates
headline.print_headline: Two Sets of Twins Trace Lifetime Link to Two Teammates
